["DescriptionThe Valley's first villa / Townhouse community, Eden is designed to elevate your every day.
3- & 4-bedroom villas in three architectural styles.
YOUR EVERY WHIM, WITHIN REACH
Just a 5-minute walk from Eden, The Pavilion will offer an impressive array of retail and leisure experiences for the very first residents at The Valley, including bicycle tracks, kids' play areas, a zen garden, and much more. There wil be something for your every day at Eden.
THE LIFESTYLE OF YOUR DREAM AWAITS
At The Valley, Emaar has put together its finest minds to bring you the best-in-class family amenities that have never been seen before in the region.
With well-shaded walkable streets, generous green spaces and an array of exceptional amenities, you and your loved ones will live the lifestyle you have always dreamed of.
The Valley is envisioned as a new quaint town.
It is comprised of a network of residential neighbourhoods through tributaries of lush greenery, forging a network of green open spaces and best-in-class community amenities that have never before been seen in the region.
The design concept stems from the desire to establish a strong sense of community family living, equipped with retail, entertainment, recreational, educational and health facilities.
This makes The Valley the perfect place for residents and their loved ones to power their dreams, becoming the next generation of UAE’s innovators and change-makers.
The Valley by Emaar is a Freehold property in Dubai with 100% ownership and a title deed that allows you to get residency visa in Dubai. Easy instalment plan with no interest.

["DescriptionWaterfront 5BR Villa
Plot Area: Starting 17,211 sqft.
GSA: 7,142 sqft.
Additional External Amenties:
Driver's Room with Bathroom
Fry Kitchen
Store Room
Welcome to Jubail Island. 
A thriving and diverse master planned community surrounded by the tranquility of nature. 
A stylish island oasis of unparalleled beauty; positioned against the backdrop of UAE’s thriving capital city, where amazing architecture will blend seamlessly with the diverse natural environment to provide an unrivaled quality of life that is a dream come true.
A true sense of belonging.
Sprawled across 4,000 hectares of mangrove forests and coastal estuaries with more than 30 km of waterfront, Jubail Island will be home to 6 distinct village communities, with deliberately bespoke, breathtakingly picturesque residential areas and community facilities.
The planning was guided by the following four principles - each a hallmark of successful towns around the world: 
Discovery and Connectivity
Wellness and Activity
Just outside Abu Dhabi - between Yas Island and Saadiyat Island – Jubail Island is a neighborhood unlike any other in the United Arab Emirates.
Located in a protected natural environment of stunning beauty, its surrounding ecosystem supports a diversity of wildlife.
Jubail Island is reality - a stunning refuge within a community waiting to be explored, just outside the vibrant inner city. Its breathtaking landscape plays an integral part of the UAE’s rich and vital ecosystem.
Your journey into this sanctuary away from busy city life begins with a series of beautiful gateway experiences leading into a network of scenic drives, with views to the open water."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionThe Noble House Real Estate is proud to offer this 2 bedroom ensuite apartment for Sale in Yansoon. 
The property is vacant and is very well kept to the highest standard. Yansoon apartments are highly sought in the Old Town area. This property features 2 bedrooms and 3 bath t with a private balcony and storage available at the desirable and amenity-rich building.
The spacious bedroom, light-filled apartment features floor to ceiling windows boasting the view of the courtyard. The close kitchen includes built-in kitchen appliances like a cooker, dishwasher, and fridge.
Built Up area is 1,272 sq.ft
Additional features include  fitted closets, central air conditioning and private storages. 
Yansoon Building is also part of the residential community which is located within the Downtown Dubai. The latter is combined with low rise 3 story apartment and mid-rise buildings with penthouses as well.
For arranged viewings pls call The Noble House Real Estate at +97144566135 or for more details and images of the property, visit our website at www.tnh.ae.']
